properties.title: Binntalhütte SAC
properties.description: A stopover on the Walser trail from Binntal across Albrunpass to Dèvero (Italy) and on to Val Formazza. The cabin belongs to the Binntal Landscape Park, famous for its minerals and the diversity of flowers. Due to the easy access this hiking and excursion destination is popular with families. Besides historic passes and smuggling trails, ascents of the nearby summits on the border of Italy are the cabin’s attractions. The view includes all of Binntal and Bietschhorn.
